title: The League of Legends Anime - Official Trailer

replies.body:
OMG MY FIORA! This needs to happen
This made me realize how hard orianna would be to fight in real life

> [{quoted}](name=Tyranicaltom,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ecmh7jrO,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-07-25T14:42:48.622+0000)
>
> OMG MY FIORA! This needs to happen
> This made me realize how hard orianna would be to fight in real life

If you are gentle with her you won't need to fight

This is a fan anime about a group of friends playing LoL. The scenes take place IRL and IG, and every character is basically the champion himself. This is why Riven is a guy and Orianna is not a robot. It's a mix between battling, student life and gaming. The dialogues are in Chinese but there are English subtitles on YouTube. 

An episode is very short for an anime, i guess it's worth giving a look. 

( Sorry for bad English btw )
Yasuo is a girl right? Please tell me that's a girl, if not they did an AWFUL visualization of Yasuo. Dear god.
